long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: On just one click this gives you all the DSA 'problem of the day' challenge from various problem solving sites. Now you don't have to visit all of them one bye one, you can see all the POTDs and even get redirected to the solving pages. A very much time shortening and usefull application for students and competetive coders
